observations: Search for emoji: No search functionality exists in the emoji panel. Code review of the codebase found no emoji search feature implementation. The emojione library is used for emoji rendering but search capability was not implemented.

Disable emoji panel in settings: The AS_ShowEmojiPanel setting constant exists in Constants.cs as a portal-level setting, but it is not exposed in the Activity Stream module settings UI (Settings.ascx). Users cannot toggle the emoji panel on/off through the standard module settings interface.

The emoji panel uses the emojione library and supports 7 categories: People, Nature, Food, Celebration, Activity, Travel, and Objects. Each category can be individually controlled via portal settings (AS_ShowEmojiPeopleCategory, AS_ShowEmojiNatureCategory, etc.).
Emojis are rendered as actual Unicode emoji characters rather than image replacements, ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
